title._content: Image taken from page 60 of 'The Pirate's Hand. A romance of heredity. By the author of “Kneecapped” ... Edited by C. Graves, etc. [The preface is signed: R. L. S. and the book appears to be intended as a parody of the style of R. L. Stevenson.]'
